channel.title: Help With Loading Cache on Webclient
channel.description:
Ok, so I jarred my client and stuff, and it only runs when the cache is in the same directory as it. So lets say 'client.jar' is on my desktop. If I run it will freeze at beginning when cache isn't there. However, if 'client.jar' and 'cache' are on my desktop, the client will run fine.
The problem is I want a webclient, and it doesn't work the same.
Any ideas how load URLs in signlink for the cache? Or a fix?

item.title: Help With Loading Cache on Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

String s = "./.file_store_32"; String s1 = "";

That finds the cache in your signlink, with the webclient you need to fix the load cache method for auto downloading and link it to the cache, where it will download to the place allocated in your signlink.

Read full topic
item.source: Help With Loading Cache on Webclient
